check_resources_fit(entity)¶

Idempotent helper method that checks if given deployment entity can be added to the resource without exceeding the limits.

Parameters

entity (continuum_deployer.resources.deployment.DeploymentEntity) – deployment entity whose fit should be tested

Returns

Check result if deployment entity cloud be placed as boolean

Return type

bool
